sqlMap.select:
/* schedule.list.onwer */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, LANG_KND, NAME, 'CRUDA' AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, 'CRUDA' AS PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, FG_COLOR, BG_COLOR, 'N' AS IS_JOINT,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG B ON B.SCHEDULE_ID = A.SCHEDULE_ID AND LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR C ON C.CALENDAR_ID = A.CALENDAR_ID WHERE C.OWNER_ID=#ownerId# AND a.CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER)
( ( START_DATIM < TO_DATE(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= END_DATIM) OR ( ( START_DATIM <= TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND FREQ IS NOT NULL AND UNTIL IS NULL) OR TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(UNTIL, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
ORDER BY START_DATIM

/* schedule.list.joint.calendar */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, LANG_KND, NAME, d.PERMISSIONS AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, a.PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, COALESCE(d.FG_COLOR, c.FG_COLOR) AS FG_COLOR, COALESCE(d.BG_COLOR, c.BG_COLOR) AS BG_COLOR, 'N' AS IS_JOINT,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG B ON B.SCHEDULE_ID = A.SCHEDULE_ID AND LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR C ON C.CALENDAR_ID = A.CALENDAR_ID JOIN CALENDAR_USER D ON D.CALENDAR_ID = C.CALENDAR_ID WHERE D.USER_ID=#userId# AND a.CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER)
( ( START_DATIM < TO_DATE(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= END_DATIM) OR ( ( START_DATIM <= TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND FREQ IS NOT NULL AND UNTIL IS NULL) OR TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(UNTIL, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
ORDER BY START_DATIM

/* schedule.list.joint.schedule */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) AS CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, c.USER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, LANG_KND, NAME, a.PERMISSIONS AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, a.PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, (SELECT FG_COLOR FROM CALENDAR WHERE IS_DEFAULT='Y' AND OWNER_ID=#userId#) AS FG_COLOR, (SELECT BG_COLOR FROM CALENDAR WHERE IS_DEFAULT='Y' AND OWNER_ID=#userId#) AS BG_COLOR, 'Y' AS IS_JOINT,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN SCHEDULE_USER c ON c.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN CALENDAR d ON d.CALENDAR_ID = a.CALENDAR_ID WHERE c.USER_ID=#userId# AND LANG_KND=#langKnd#
( ( START_DATIM < TO_DATE(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= END_DATIM) OR ( ( START_DATIM <= TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND FREQ IS NOT NULL AND UNTIL IS NULL) OR TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(UNTIL, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
ORDER BY START_DATIM

/* schedule.list.public */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, B.LANG_KND, NAME, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_ID=p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE CASE WHEN d.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN g.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN 'R' ELSE g.PERMISSIONS END ELSE d.PERMISSIONS END END AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, CASE WHEN a.OWNER_ID=p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE CASE WHEN a.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN 'R' ELSE a.PERMISSIONS END END AS PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, c.FG_COLOR, c.BG_COLOR,
p.NM_KOR OWNER_NAME
p.NM_ENG OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN USERPASS p ON p.USER_ID = #userId# JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG B ON B.SCHEDULE_ID = A.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR_PUBLIC C ON C.CALENDAR_ID = A.CALENDAR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CALENDAR_PUBLIC_USER D ON D.CALENDAR_ID = C.CALENDAR_ID AND D.USER_ID=#userId# LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT e.CALENDAR_ID, e.GROUP_ID, e.PERMISSIONS, f.USER_ID FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP e JOIN USERPASS f ON f.ORG_CD = e.GROUP_ID WHERE f.USER_ID=#userId# ) g ON g.CALENDAR_ID = a.CALENDAR_ID WHERE a.CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER)
( ( START_DATIM < TO_DATE(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= END_DATIM) OR ( ( START_DATIM <= TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND FREQ IS NOT NULL AND UNTIL IS NULL) OR TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(UNTIL, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
ORDER BY START_DATIM

/* schedule.list.user.public */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, B.LANG_KND, NAME, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_ID = p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE COALESCE(d.PERMISSIONS, 'R') END AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, CASE WHEN a.OWNER_ID = p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE COALESCE(a.PERMISSIONS, 'R') END AS PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, c.FG_COLOR, c.BG_COLOR,
p.NM_KOR AS OWNER_NAME
p.NM_ENG OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN USERPASS p ON p.USER_ID=#userId# JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG B ON B.SCHEDULE_ID = A.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR C ON C.CALENDAR_ID = A.CALENDAR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CALENDAR_USER D ON D.CALENDAR_ID = C.CALENDAR_ID AND D.USER_ID=#userId# WHERE a.CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER)
( ( START_DATIM < TO_DATE(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= END_DATIM) OR ( ( START_DATIM <= TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND FREQ IS NOT NULL AND UNTIL IS NULL) OR TO_DATE(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(UNTIL, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
ORDER BY START_DATIM

/* schedule.detail.owner */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, 'CRUDA' AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, a.PERMISSIONS, a.ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN CALENDAR c ON c.calendar_id = a.calendar_id WHERE c.OWNER_ID=#userId# AND LANG_KND=#langKnd# AND a.SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)

/* schedule.detail.joint.calendar */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, c.PERMISSIONS AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, a.PERMISSIONS, a.ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN CALENDAR_USER c ON c.calendar_id = a.calendar_id WHERE c.USER_ID=#userId# AND LANG_KND=#langKnd# AND a.SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)

/* schedule.detail.joint.schedule */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, a.PERMISSIONS AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, a.PERMISSIONS, a.ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM,
(SELECT NM_KOR FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
(SELECT NM_ENG FROM USERPASS WHERE USER_ID = a.OWNER_ID) AS OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN SCHEDULE_USER c ON c.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID WHERE c.USER_ID=#userId# AND LANG_KND=#langKnd# AND a.SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)

/* schedule.detail.public */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_ID=p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE CASE WHEN d.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN g.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN 'R' ELSE g.PERMISSIONS END ELSE d.PERMISSIONS END END AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, CASE WHEN a.OWNER_ID=p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE CASE WHEN a.PERMISSIONS IS NULL THEN 'R' ELSE a.PERMISSIONS END END AS PERMISSIONS, a.ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM,
p.NM_KOR OWNER_NAME
p.NM_ENG OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN USERPASS p ON p.USER_ID=#userId# JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR_PUBLIC C ON c.CALENDAR_ID = a.CALENDAR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CALENDAR_PUBLIC_USER d ON d.CALENDAR_ID = c.CALENDAR_ID AND d.USER_ID=#userId# LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT e.CALENDAR_ID, e.GROUP_ID, e.PERMISSIONS, f.USER_ID FROM CALENDAR_PUBLIC_GROUP e JOIN USERPASS f ON f.ORG_CD = e.GROUP_ID WHERE f.USER_ID=#userId# ) g ON g.CALENDAR_ID = a.CALENDAR_ID WHERE a.SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)

/* schedule.detail.user.public */ SELECT a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, a.OWNER_ID, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_ID = p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE COALESCE(d.PERMISSIONS, 'R') END AS CAL_PERMISSIONS, CASE WHEN a.OWNER_ID = p.USER_ID THEN 'CRUDA' ELSE COALESCE(a.PERMISSIONS, 'R') END AS PERMISSIONS, a.ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, a.INS_DATIM, a.UPD_DATIM,
p.NM_KOR OWNER_NAME
p.NM_ENG OWNER_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE a JOIN USERPASS p ON p.USER_ID=#userId# JOIN SCHEDULE_LANG b ON b.SCHEDULE_ID = a.SCHEDULE_ID AND b.LANG_KND=#langKnd# JOIN CALENDAR C ON c.CALENDAR_ID = a.CALENDAR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CALENDAR_USER d ON d.CALENDAR_ID = c.CALENDAR_ID AND d.USER_ID=#userId# WHERE a.SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.insert: /* schedule.insert */ INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_ID, CALENDAR_ID, ALLDAY, OWNER_ID, PERMISSIONS, ALARM_PATTERN, FREQ, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYMONTHDAY, BYDAY, START_DATIM, END_DATIM, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM) VALUES (CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER), CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER), $allday$, #ownerId#, #permissions#, #alarmPattern#, #freq#, #until#, #interval#, #bymonthday#, #byday#, TO_TIMESTAMP(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: /* schedule.update */ UPDATE SCHEDULE SET UPD_DATIM=SYSDATE , START_DATIM=TO_TIMESTAMP(#start#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , END_DATIM=TO_TIMESTAMP(#end#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , PERMISSIONS=#permissions# , CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) , ALLDAY=$allday$ , ALARM_PATTERN=#alarmPattern# , FREQ=#freq# , UNTIL=#until# , INTERVAL=#interval# , BYMONTHDAY=#bymonthday# , BYDAY=#byday# WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=CAST(#scheduleId# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.select: /* schedule.ical.years */ SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(START_DATIM, 'YYYY') AS YEARS FROM SCHEDULE WHERE CALENDAR_ID=CAST(#calendarId# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY YEARS ASC
